page.title: 07Light Industry in Debenham.
page.content: Debenham has some light industry which mainly supports the agricultural community it serves. Bloomfield and Sons,Agricultural Engineers,is a family firm started by Mr M. Bloomfield,who served an apprenticeship at Garretts of Leiston. He set up a business in Debenham where he serviced steam traction engines,then widely used.The workshops are still situated alongside the south entrance to the Parish Church,with a newer site nearby. The firm installs farm machinery, small mechanical mills,pumps and electrical equipment.It also sells a full range of farm tools. A plastics factory is at present under construction,where Christmas decorations will be manufactured.There has been some opposition to this with several debates at the planning stage.
